Are you passionate about diamonds, jewelry, and bringing value to professional clients in the diamond industry? If you think you have what it takes to make Jonah Levi even better for our clients, please take a look at our current vacancies or get in touch.

Italian Speaker — Junior Account Executive
About this position
We are searching for a hardworking, motivated, and extroverted sales person, who will build up and manage a personal portfolio of clients in the territory of Italy. No prior sales experience required, but can be an advantage. This is a commission-only vacancy with uncapped earning potential.
Your responsibilities
  • Autonomous acquisition of prospective business client in Italy.
  • Respectful presentation of our offers and services.
  • Establishing strong relationships with customers through weekly follow-ups and on-site visits.
  • Negotiating short-term and long-term contracts with high-level executives
  • Closing deals and achieving sales targets
  • CRM related work. Logging and reporting of calls, emails, visits, and deals at a highly-detailed level.
Your personal characteristics

In addition of knowledge in the field of reading and interpreting diamond Certificates and an intuitive feel for prices and trends you should have the following required qualities to succeed:

  • Excellent spoken and written communication skills in Italian and English
  • Strong presentation and negotiation skills
  • Confidence, tact, and a persuasive manner
  • Outstanding organizational and time management skills
  • Be a self-motivated individual
  • Solid inter-personal skills, maturity, patience, IT skills
  • Setting personal monthly and annual sales targets and over-achieving them
  • Above all, you should have a high level of persistence
Your rewards in this position
  • Truly unlimited commission depending on your skills alone
  • Fully structured mentoring program that will set you up for success
  • Net-30 payments
  • Work from everywhere in the world. No morning commuting anymore.
  • Work when and how long you desire—no fixed working hours if you can get results
Employment type
Self-employment
Experience
Entry level
Location
Global, Italy preferred
